delete.title: Delete {{ name, pluralPossessive }} Account
delete.subtitle: Permanently remove this member's account from your organization.

Modal.title: Member Invitation
Modal.subtitle: Send an invitation email to a member of your organization.
Modal.info: The invited member will be able to create their own account, setting their name and password.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: An e-mail address is required to invite a member to your organization.

Success.lastLogin: Last seen at {{ time, friendlyTime }} on {{ date, friendlyDate }}

email.label: Email Address
email.required: An email address is required to update an account.

name.label: Full Name
name.required: A name is required to update an account.

SettingsModal.title: Application Settings
SettingsModal.subtitle: These settings do not effect your organization or its members.

theme.label: Color Scheme
theme.hint: Update the application's design to match the current time-of-day, or use your personal preference.

Card.title: Danger
Card.subtitle: Take caution when making use of the following features.

Page.title: Something's gone wrong!
Page.subtitle: An unexpected error has occured that the application could not recover from.

Page.title: Login
Page.subtitle: Enter your account's e-mail address and password to login.

username.label: E-Mail Address
username.required: An e-mail address is required to login.

password.label: Password
password.required: A password is required to login.

Page.success: Successfully logged you into your account.

delete.title: Delete your organization
delete.subtitle: Permanently delete your organization, removing all of its accounts and roles.

name.label: Organization Name
name.required: A name is required when updating your organization.

Success.createdAt: Created on {{ createdAt, friendlyDate }} at {{ createdAt, friendlyTime }}

Page.title: Signup Confirmation
Page.emailNotFound: Your email address could not be determined.
Page.emailNotFoundSteps: You can find a link to this page in the confirmation email sent to the address you provided during signup.
Page.codeEmail: We've sent a confirmation code to {{ email }}.
Page.codeUse: Copy and paste it below to finish creating your account.

code.label: Confirmation Code
code.required: A confirmation code is required to confirm your account.

Page.failure: Your account could not be confirmed.

Page.title: Create Organization
Page.subtitle: Finishing signing up by creating your organization and its administrator role.

name.label: Organization Name
name.required: An name is required to create an organization.

adminRoleName.label: Administrator Role Name
adminRoleName.required: A name for your administrator role is required to create an organization.

Page.title: Sign Up
Page.subtitle: Enter some of your personal information below to begin creating your account and organization.

name.label: Name
name.length: Your name must be shorter than 70 characters.
name.required: Your name is required to signup.

username.label: E-Mail Address
username.required: An e-mail address is required to signup.

password.label: Password
password.minLength: Your password must be longer than 8 characters.
password.required: A password is required to signup.

Page.success: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address.
